Resources¶

Some of the helpful resources used to create the app.

Documentation¶

  • Django’s syndication feed framework

Specifications¶

  • RSS 2.0 specification
  • Podcasts Connect help (iTunes-specific tags)
  • iOS 11 specification update
  • Google Play Music
  • ID3 standards
  • iTunes metadata

Validators¶

  • W3C Feed Validation Service
  • Podba.se Podcast Validator
  • Cast Feed Validator
  • Feed Validator

Resources¶
